text: Sam Parriott is an American drag racer.Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars (Cartech, 2003), pp.180-8. Driving a Cadillac-powered gasser named City of Industry (variously a 1953 or 1963 Kurtis), Parriot won several NHRA national gasser titles. In the 1953 car, he took A/SP (A Production) at Oklahoma City, Oklahoma in 1958 (with a pass of 12.17 seconds at ),Davis, p.180. AM/SP (A Modified Production) at Detroit Dragway in 1960 (with a pass of 12.29 seconds at ), and at Indianapolis Raceway Park in 1961 (with a pass of 11.91 seconds at ) and 1962 (with a pass of 12.53 seconds at ).Davis, pp.180-3. In the 1963 car, he won the national AAM/SP (A Modified Production supercharged) title at Indianapolis Raceway Park in 1964 with a 10.62/ pass.Davis, p.184. ==Notes== ==Sources== *Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars, North Branch, MN: Cartech, 2003, pp.180-8. Category:Dragster drivers Category:American racing drivers
title: Sam Parriott
